item.title: Unlock Your Career Potential with Free Oracle Certifications for Cybersecurity and IT Professionals
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "IT Certifications" , "Professional Development" , "Oracle Certifications" , "Cloud Computing" , "Data Management" , "Career Advancement" , "Online Learning" , "Technology Education"
item.description: Discover the value of free Oracle certifications for cybersecurity and IT professionals, and explore the opportunities they offer for career advancement in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).

item.title: Network Plus Course:
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "CompTIA Network Plus" , "IT Certification" , "Cybersecurity" , "Data Security" , "Network Administration" , "Technology Education" , "Professional Development" , "Digital Skills" , "Information Technology" , "Online Learning"
item.description: Learn the best practices for secure asset disposal in network security, including factory reset, wiping configurations, and sanitization methods to ensure data security.
